resources.string: Vibrate during switching the flashlight on and off
The time interval during which you need to do 3 clicks

To switch on the flashlight just click 3 times on your phone\'s hardware Power Button. \nMake sure that you click not very fast (the screen should turn on/off). \nSo, if you click 3 times during 2 seconds interval (yo can change it in Settings), the flashlight will turn on. To turn it off, click 3 times again.
